page.title: 18PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content:
There is{very little public transport; most people have their{own cars}to get to and from work. The only two points at which{buses}can be boarded (New Inn and Hanbury cross roads) are both a long walk from most houses.
A bus to nearby Burton leaves the New Inn at 7.55 am each weekday, returning from Burton at 4.35 pm. On Thursdays (market day) and Saturdays there is an extra bus leaving at 10.40 am and returning from Burton at 1.35 pm.
A bus to Burton via Anslow leaves Hanbury cross roads at 8.20 am, with the return from Burton at 4.30 pm and 5.45 pm. There is an extra bus on Wednesday and Saturday.
{Private cars are a necessity!
